title: Premiere: Troy – Cover Me
content:
For an independent artist, currently still releasing music via his own means, Troy is already a resounding success.

With an EP from last year clocking up well over a million plays in total on Spotify, as well as having over 100k monthly listeners, his soulful brand of hearts-on-sleeves anthems are clearly striking a chord. His latest offering, Cover Me, has the sort of classic rock songwriting tinge to it that Ben Howard’s second album nailed – coming across as emotionally raw yet achingly addictive. This just cries out for repeated listens. Check out Cover Me below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
